products.title: Splash Dove Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash dove grey panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The light grey panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash smokey purple panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The rich purple panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Smoke Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash smoke blue panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This saturated, medium blue dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Cream Panel Blind
products.description: Splash cream panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The light cream fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. At swift direct blinds, like all their made to measure products, these panel blinds are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Voile Fr Sandshell Cream Panel Blind
products.description: Their voile fr fabrics look beautiful up due to their translucent properties in a wide array of neutral shades. Durable and stylish, this translucent cream panel blind allows the light to filter through and is hand-washable. This cream panel is ideal for kitchens as it's flame-retardant. Panel blinds are great for covering large spans of glass or as window dividers due to their large widths and drops.

products.title: Chatsworth Cream Panel Blind
products.description: A modern patterned translucent fabric in 3 colour ways. You will also find this design in their vertical and roller blind collections. This bold cream and white patterned panel blind will look great in any room and can also be used as a divider. Product id: db-pan0089 fabric colour: cream headrail: white aluminium control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes chatsworth cream panel blind in cream.

products.title: Bella Blackout Smokey Purple Panel Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This soft, smokey purple panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Cream Panel Blind
products.description: Simple, soft and warm, their bella blackout cream panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop.

products.title: Bella Blackout Smoke Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This smoke blue panel blind freshens up any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Dove Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This dove grey panel blind freshens up any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Cream Panel Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.
